class.name: CSGBox3D
class.description: This node allows you to create a box for use with the CSG system. [b]Note:[/b] CSG nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating CSG nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [MeshInstance3D] with a [PrimitiveMesh]. Moving a CSG node within another CSG node also has a significant CPU cost, so it should be avoided during gameplay.

members.member: The material used to render the box.
The box's width, height and depth.
